name: Unruly Ghouls
description: Do you hate ghouls? Would you like to obliterate ghouls using your anti-ghoul inventions? Unruly Ghouls is a fun arcade style defense shooter set in a beautifully spooky environment. Experience what it feels like to be inside an arcade game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970/AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1024 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Where to start?? First let me say that I've had the best time with this game. It's a defense type game that has a shooter element. The ghouls are nicely animated and very polished. At one point I had turned my head and there was a little ghoul coming at me and it made me jump a bit. The game isn't scary but it was in my space so it startled me. Great game and priced awesome!
